pageProduct.name: Sukin Pink Clay Facial Masque 100ml
pageProduct.description:
Â 

General Information

Say hello to one of our newest members to our masque family, our Sensitive Pink Clay Mask! Although it is new, it's already a favourite! Our Pink Clay Masque has been formulated from a blend of pink & red clays, that work together to gently extract impurities and environmental pollutants to leave your skin looking naturally clear and radiant. With soothing Tasmnian Pepper, Aloe Vera and Chamomile our mask leaves the skin, soothed hydrated and nourished. Get your sensitive skin glowing!
TIP: Follow with a facial oil or serum, as your skin will soak up all of the goodness after being masked!
Winner of Best Mask in beautyheaven's 2019 Glosscar Awards.

Ingredients

Water (Aqua), Kaolin, Bentonite, Stearic Acid, Cetyl Alcohol, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Glyceryl Stearate, Cetearyl Alcohol, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Coco-Caprylate, Ceteareth-20, Tasmannia Lanceolata Fruit/Leaf Extract (Tasmanian Pepper), Cucumis Sativus (Cucumber) Fruit Extract, Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria) Flower Extract (Chamomile), Vanilla Planifolia Fruit Extract, Tocopherol (Vitamin E), Glycerin, Hematite Powder*, Iron Hydroxide*, Aluminum Hydroxide*, Vanillin, Xanthan Gum, Citric Acid, Ethylhexylglycerin, Phenoxyethanol, Benzyl Alcohol. *Component of Natural Clays

Directions

Apply to damp face and neck. Relax and allow to penetrate for 15 minutes and then rinse off with warm water and wash cloth
